title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Computer Network Practical Skills through Activity-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Design real-world network environments and analyze components using network simulation tools (Minetest, Cisco Packet Tracer)
Apply role distribution and communication strategies among team members in network troubleshooting scenarios through collaborative learning activities
Practice core technical skills such as subnetting and routing protocol configuration based on CCNA-level practical knowledge
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
